titles.title: Waiving points of order against a conference report to accompany the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 68) establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2000 and setting forth appropriate budgetary levels for each of the fiscal years 2001 through 2009.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-92, by Mr. Linder.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 35.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H. Con. Res. 68 with 1 hour of general debate.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 137.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 205 (Roll no. 84).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/13/1999--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H. Con. Res. 68 (congressional budget).
